summary: This document is an email chain from January 2020 between FBI agents discussing the need to contact a witness in Sweden for an investigation involving Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell. The agents are coordinating with the National Police in Sweden and FBI Legat in Copenhagen to ensure proper procedures are followed before interviewing the witness.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Mentioned as a subject of the FBI investigation along with Ghislaine Maxwell.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Mentioned as a subject of the FBI investigation along with Jeffrey Epstein.

persons.name: Gregory Massa
persons.context: FBI Legat in Copenhagen whose area of responsibility includes Sweden; copied on the email about contacting a witness in Sweden.

connections.description: Both are named as subjects in the same FBI investigation mentioned in the email.

events.title: FBI agent seeks to contact witness in Sweden
events.description: An FBI case agent in New York emails colleagues to coordinate contacting a witness in Sweden for an interview related to the Epstein/Maxwell investigation.

events.title: Coordination with Swedish National Police
events.description: An FBI agent reports having spoken with the National Police in Sweden about the witness situation and is awaiting guidance on proceeding under Swedish law.

keyFacts: The FBI was actively investigating Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell as of January 2020, after Epstein's death in August 2019.
There was a witness located in Sweden that the FBI sought to interview for the investigation.
The FBI was coordinating with the National Police in Sweden and following proper international legal channels to contact the witness.
The email chain shows ongoing investigative efforts into the Epstein/Maxwell case in early 2020.
